snippet: The nominee for S.E.C. chairwoman must address concerns about her Wall Street ties to determine her allegiances.
abstract: Editorial urges senators to aggressively question Mary Jo White, Pres Obama's nominee for chairwoman of Securities and Exchange Commission, during her confirmation hearing; holds White must address concerns about her Wall Street ties and give specifics on her approach to the job.
lead_paragraph: The nominee for S.E.C. chairwoman must address concerns about her Wall Street ties to determine her allegiances.

headline.seo: Confirmation Questions for Mary Jo White
headline.main: Confirmation Questions for Mary Jo White
headline.print_headline: Confirmation Questions for Mary Jo White
